projects: [{"title":"Maintaining and measuring mental wellness","start_date":"Jan 2014","description":"Working with the team on the commercialization of product, developed by scientists from Technical University and Semmelweis University (Hungary), Zurich University of Applied Sciences (Switzerland).Main areas of focus:- pilot marketing research- marketing plan, including segmentation and target groups identification- business plan based on Lean Start-up approach"},{},{},{},{"title":"Entrepreneurship Cell MJCET","start_date":"Oct 2008","end_date":"Apr 2010","description":"Founded to establish a sustainable Culture of Entrepreneurship transforming young people into Innovative Leaders of tomorrow."},{},{},{}]
